thread.title: Mother of Making a Murderer’s Brendan Dassey lashes out | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Mother of Making a Murderer’s Brendan Dassey lashes out | Daily Mail Online

author: Chris White For Dailymail.Com
title: Mother of Making a Murderer’s Brendan Dassey lashes out | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad EXCLUSIVE: 'He is a piece of dog s**t!' The mother of Making a Murderer’s Brendan Dassey rails against the chief prosecutor in the case insisting she was barred from interrogations even though her son had the mental age of NINE Brendan Dassey's mother, Barbara Tadych, speaks out for the first time about her son's interrogation by police in a new book about his murder trial The Netflix documentary Making a Murderer set out to prove Dassey and his uncle Steven Avery did not kill photographer Teresa Halbach Tadych berates district attorney and interrogation team that resulted in her son being found, guilty, calling them 'dog s**t' and 'd bags' Her damning commentary comes on the eve of chief prosecutor Ken Kratz’s opposing book, allegedly proving Dassey and Avery DID commit the murder In an exclusive interview with Dailymail.com, Kratz said: 'Making a Murderer is a very good piece of entertainment but it's not really what happened' Though Dassey had his original life sentence quashed last August, he has remained in prison as the ruling is appealed this week Published: 19:37 GMT, 15 February 2017 | Updated: 15:34 GMT, 16 February 2017 236 shares
